Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Relates to the housing of transgender or intersex incarcerated individuals
Summary: Relates to the housing of transgender or intersex incarcerated individuals; authorizes the sheriff to assign a transgender or intersex incarcerated individual to any facility housing unit which shall ensure the incarcerated individual's health and safety.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to the housing of transgender or intersex incarcerated individuals
